alert.note: Alert for Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 7:43PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Martin Parish through 815 PM CDT... At 741 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ramah, or 11 miles northeast of Catahoula, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Catahoula, Henderson, Atchafalaya Welcome Center, Butte La Rose, and Cecilia. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 116 and 126. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
